project_plan.name: Temperature Converter CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a command-line tool that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin based on user input.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion logic for Celsius to Fahrenheit and Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion logic for Fahrenheit to Celsius and Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion logic for Kelvin to Celsius and Fahrenheit
Create user input prompts to specify the input temperature and desired output unit
Write tests for each of the temperature conversion features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
